testCase.name: Given a TicTacToe board When the board is initialised Then a new board object is created
Given a TicTacToe board When the board is initialised Then a board printing method is created
Given a TicTacToe board When a mark is placed on the board Then the board should contain that mark
Given a TicTacToe board When a mark is placed on the board Then the board indicates that the cell is not empty
Given a new TicTacToe game When the game starts Then a new board is created
Given a new TicTacToe game When the game starts Then the "Game Board Creation..." message is printed
Given a new TicTacToe game When the game starts Then the empty board is printed
Given a new TicTacToe game When the game starts Then the "Board Created." message is printed
Given a new TicTacToe game When the game starts Then the "The game will start with player X" message is printed
Given the first round of a TicTacToe game When Player X places their mark on the board Then the mark will be added to the board
Given the first round of a TicTacToe game When Player X places their mark on the board Then the "Player X:" message is printed
Given the first round of a TicTacToe game When Player X places their mark on the board Then the board with the new mark is printed
Given the second round of a TicTacToe game When Player O places their mark on the board Then the mark will be added to the board
Given the second round of a TicTacToe game When Player O places their mark on the board Then the "Player O:" message is printed
Given the second round of a TicTacToe game When Player O places their mark on the board Then the board with the new mark is printed
Given a TicTacToe player When the player is initialised Then a new player object is created
Given a TicTacToe player When the player is initialised Then the player's mark is set
Given a TicTacToe player When the player is taking their turn Then a mark is placed on the board
Given a TicTacToe player When the player is taking their turn And the cell is not empty Then the original mark is kept in the cell
Given a TicTacToe player When the player is taking their turn And the cell is not empty Then they place their mark in a different cell on the board
